                               Object value)

        Parameters:

        value - The header value.
        Can be null (will be skipped).
        Returns:

      • headers

        public MockRest.Builder headers(Map<String,Object> value)
        Adds the specified headers to every request.
        Parameters:
        value - The header values.
        Can be null (existing values will be cleared).
        null null map values will be ignored.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • serializer

        public MockRest.Builder serializer(Serializer value)
        Convenience method for setting the Content-Type header to the primary media type on the specified serializer.
        Parameters:
        value - The serializer to get the media type from.
        If null, header will be reset.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • parser

        public MockRest.Builder parser(Parser value)
        Convenience method for setting the Accept header to the primary media type on the specified parser.
        Parameters:
        value - The parser to get the media type from.
        If null, header will be reset.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • marshall

        public MockRest.Builder marshall(Marshall value)
        Convenience method for setting the Accept and Content-Type headers to the primary media types on the specified marshall.
        Parameters:
        value - The marshall to get the media types from.
        If null, headers will be reset.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • contextPath

        public MockRest.Builder contextPath(String value)
        Identifies the context path for the REST resource.

        If not specified, uses "".

        Parameters:
        value - The context path.
        Must not be null and must either be blank or start but not end with a '/' character.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • servletPath

        public MockRest.Builder servletPath(String value)
        Identifies the servlet path for the REST resource.

        If not specified, uses "".

        Parameters:
        value - The servlet path.
        Must not be null and must either be blank or start but not end with a '/' character.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • build

        public MockRest build()
        Create a new MockRest object based on the settings on this builder.
        Returns:
        A new MockRest object.
